name: Fight! Fight! Fight!
description:
This gladiator arena welcomes all kinds of fighters - Knights, barbarians, wizards, ninjas... Take control of one of these warriors, each with their own unique abilities, and fight to the death!

Keyboard Controls:

Player 1: WASD = Move, C = Dodge, V = Attack

Player 2: IJKL = Move, Left Arrow = Dodge, Right Arrow = Attack

Enter = Begin New Battle

Controls (PS4 or Xbox 360 controller - Recommended)

Left Stick = Move

Right Stick = Aim

Right Trigger = Attack

Left Trigger = Dodge

Left Shoulder Button = Lock on / Lock off

Circle / B = Begin New Battle

This is the first of 5 prototypes I'm planning on releasing by the end of 2018. Let me know what you think!

Note: There's a known bug where you can get stuck in walls if you're knocked back into them or dodge into them. Try and dodge out, and if it doesn't work, press Circle or B to start a new fight. Sorry!

Other Note: Some Macs can't run the game due to security settings. Working on a fix.
